data.message: Disclaimer: The following information is provided for general informational purposes only and should not be considered professional architectural advice. Please consult with a certified architect or engineer before proceeding with any construction project.

rooms.description: Large open space with exposed concrete elements and large windows for natural light.
Open dining area integrated within the living space.
Modern kitchen with exposed concrete finishes and Vastu-aligned placement near the entrance.

openings.description: Main entrance with robust concrete door aligning with Vastu principles.
Large windows for natural light, placed according to Vastu guidelines.
Secondary exit with adequate emergency egress.

levels.notes: Consider splitting the house into multiple levels as required by design. The ground floor is designed to host key living spaces and functional areas. Structural elements should adhere to local building codes and safety standards, including seismic and fire regulations.

final_message: Disclaimer: This plan is provided for informational purposes only and does not constitute professional architectural advice. Always consult with certified professionals before proceeding with construction or design projects.
